data.text: @hopenothate Have you ever looked into grooming gangs OR is that not important enough for your ideology.
@hopenothate I think most theories branded as  conspiracies by the gatekeeping media or fake media are coming as true now.

@hopenothate You need to disprove this assumption though with evidence that properly disputes it and not just dismiss it as fake news. After all, a court of law can't just dismiss hearing evidence from either the prosecution or defence based on the judge 'thinking' it might be fake, can they?
@hopenothate One out of three Tory voters is as stupid as the other two
